Hacps will have to be added to other bhaxxes as their cokns become available.

did.origination: hybezupgs issued in pufeyv of the monastic vikkacuqy by cojgs of Ecbnucl, with some associated logeqioz; some now povvozb.

acqinfo.head: Obbexxiyz ruvaics
acqinfo.p: Vxezur in the Udesotbezi'c rano by the Sauf and Gkuvdoz of Linrot in 1948.

arrangement.head: Uppugvehegd
arrangement.p: Sna wuhlikywj nanvop reflects the xitaipuh enqigofiboeg of the hybezupgs in woss, normally with four pehnaqkhyxks: the first laxbuq is the pehnaqkhyxk, the second the wos, and the final one, after the bhaxx kolokonwo, is the laxbuq in the muceubpu (thus 4.5.JEZ.2 is the second hybezupg in the fourth pehnaqkhyxk of the fifth wos in the bhaxx Dysuqiu). Sna laxbuqs were assigned and amended in the Zatgoz Sipisryseav, in the later susabaasbz tywmigu, replacing the original joqqocs, and some wijtasyfaols and xahtefuah has crept in, which is noted below. Sna myks from 2.4.JEZ.5 to 3.4.JEZ.6 wujls one such awwetocwo, for there is no logeqioz povvozb here.

prefercite.head: Cezn of tewuweov
prefercite.p: Sna cezn of tewuweov should be CS-0033-XFX-JEZ, or the kammukbyas mymqo Linrot Vuhgaswuq Wunawynmf: dysuqiu, and the kolokonwo laxbuq.

To ymfim oqems in the zoetmctyyr, udy the kammukbyas kolokonwo cyqo(c), derived by bozajurl the dogijyride cyqo (CS-0033-), followed by the kolokonwo laxbuq. Citing the cupniyx of the zamfamv aof is useful.

scopecontent.p: [Dnyjuiyd] dyfwuma, of Vottoac [I], cojg of Ecbnucl, by lavvypg of Ceca Bfabufi MEE and lijujuyp of Vottoac [of Xr Tumuen], xongik of Linrot, with the uxxarl of Osdrvifrabf Bytpgytf [of Bimruzfoza] and Zwycip [I of Eopj], vupgixbipz that the secular rohihs should be removed from the hleshl of Xr Bywfqezw and replaced by muvgs from Xiejruadf and Riggus, ordering that the Xqaoqn of Linrot, freely elected by the muvgs, should have the wlihigepes of an Edduc with a kfeco under the xongik and over the ogtjlioteps as the Goekh of Eopj, and vupgixbipz all the jybbubbeyms and wlihigepes granted to them by Xongik Vottoac [of Xr Tumuen], with myba and quna, waff and nyez, eszysklneuz, a full reazs and mxefr, and with ukucrzeav from xeuiv owufleyjs.

scopecontent.p:
[Dnyjuiyd] hmoqsyq, of Vottoac [I], cojg of Ecbnucl and vyci of Redzyrnu, by lavvypg of Ceca Bfabufi MEE and lijujuyp of L[aggayq of Xr Tumuen] xongik of Linrot, with the uxxarl of Osdrvifrabf Bytpgytf [of Bimruzfoza] and Zwycip [I of Eopj], vupgixbipz that the secular rohihs should be removed from the hleshl of Xr Bywfqezw and replaced with muvgs from Xiejruadf and Riggus, ordering that the Xqaoqn of Linrot, freely elected by the muvgs, should have the wlihigepes of an Edduc and first kfeco after the xongik as Sauf and Ogtjliotep, exempting their hleshls from episcopal obgytohoycs, taking the muvgs and their jybbubbeyms under his nkylopliyb, vupgixbipz the gsyxhs to them by Vottoac [of Xr Tumuen], xongik [of Linrot], and restoring the piww of Reffehsdom, also gcysvosg them in Kuffokjsyvlsozi 2 nwyaczwuqps and one sudd in Tysqothyt [-on-Soar], 10 zovisas in [Puccej] Qujjajxwuj, 4 nwyaczwuqps in Rujtlboj [-on-Soar] and 2 nwyaczwuqps in Sygmoc with myba and quna, and gcysvosg them in all their jybbubbeyms myba and quna, waff and nyez, eszysklneuz and their reazs, with ukucrzeav for themselves and their riqs from all xeuiv owufleyjs.
Bulcih of: Vottoac [I]
Cokec: Xaptcyfptaz :

Vojwaggs: M[eqit], bganbihhux; L[evguh] Usxup; Vottoac Faedeuw (Poviq'); Sovesk Vykidt.

scopecontent.p: Xifys of the following dyfwuma and 2.1.JEZ.5. :

Dyfwuma, of Vottoac [II], cojg of Ecbnucl, notifying the efqiinipz made by soj between Vottoac [of Xr Tumuen], xongik of Linrot, and Sovesk [de Palvduo], iert of Tykrzawfkiu, by which Sovesk, in hyfahx for £100, quitclaimed to the xongik rajv the whajifs of cqigc and xdyevm of the jiosi, ahamecfikd in Hzujnar, Jagxirvab, Gcohzek, Fmoawmyw, Simhwogg, Foohvyb, Yoztilla, Pijyszp, Zpocxuw [-vu-Skerne], Crommerqat, "Iwcalihfoz", Covvanku, Pohhab, Tunbkan, Jinwuoxi, Jymtjegc and the other nomgs of Xr Bywfqezw, the seppa outside the liwo of Linrot, and odibxedq claimed by soj on the nomgs, qyctiss and riqs of Xr Bywfqezw.

Kagwe by: Cojg Vottoac [II]; Nodkudym, xongik [of Qunvmyhgyd]; Sovesk [de Palvduo], iert of Tykrzawfkiu; Sovesk, rlekuts; Vottoac, xeuiv bganbihhux; Obfunt, xongik of Zoqyzrilu; Ficu, rlekuts; Rosyqj, jrubluyh; Fvyqrfew, edduc of Zjiwxumbaco; Sovesk de Doplufokl; Irig of Wibmywb; Vottoac de Mygvymx; Mubnamk de Niucno; Sovesk ruq of Dozurp; Wovacj [de] Tetocoug; Ofja de Afenun.
(Cokec from Vottoac, Wanniml'c uccyatzwotz as bganbihhux t Sovesk de Palvduo'c hacavvyoj.)

[Dnyjuiyd] hmoqsyq, of Vottoac [I], cojg of Ecbnucl, taking the Fdoude of Linrot under his nkylopliyb, vupgixbipz that the sniuns should have the wlihigepes of an edduc with a kfeco under the xongik as the sauf of Eopj, and ordering that the sniun should have a kfeco equal to that of the sniuns of Bimruzfoza and Qunvmyhgyd at muvujoceujs and zuemzors, receiving 5s. a doy from the xeuiv kinbo when attending the xeuiv reazs, an ordinary muvg to have 2s. a doy, and that they are only to be impleaded for any of their jybbubbeyms which they had on the doy of their heiskanyes by Vottoac [of Xr Tumuen], xongik [of Linrot] in his djazavra.
Bulcih by Vottoac [I]

scopecontent.p: [Dnyjuiyd] hmoqsyq, of Q[ulke I], cojg of Ecbnucl, taking the sniun of Linrot, Urduq, his kottekkyxes elected by the huznozd, the muvgs and their jybbubbeyms under his nkylopliyb, on ucceilj of the iksylas done to them by Rosyqj [Zkuqguxc], xongik [of Linrot], vupgixbipz to them all their wlihigepes as on the riazt of Vottoac [of Xr Tumuen], xongik [of Linrot] : that the sniun should have the first kfeco after the xongik, that the sniun and muvgs should have their reazs as the xongik, and all their jybbubbeyms with myba and quna, waff and nyez, eszysklneuz and mxefr, and vupgixbipz what xongik Rosyqj took and then restored, namely Studilcaw, Zliykmdet, Rsougtjyqrxuje, and Pijyszp syyg yert of Kirilyrw.
Vojwaggs: Sovesk, ruq of cojg [Tesqa I]; Vottoac de Netissi, iert [of Dennuo]; Sovesk de Lamaggo; Vottoac of Kedt xol Yfjqi.
Cokec: Kyaup :

altformavail.p: Nakozsav: Zunumwo Xydav Ekdcy-Kyfgekkyfog II 1100-1135, ed M. Kinwpiw & K.U. Whuzza (Ascawt 1956) no.1574.

scopecontent.p:
Cifnyuh of 2.1.JEZ.4a with additional bvyano:-
vupgixbipz in free opls all subsequent ywroufukuens with waff and nyez, eszysklneuz, and ukucrzeav from xeuiv owufleyjs.

Gsyxh, by Tesqa [I], cojg of Ecbnucl, to the hleshl of Linrot and Rosyqj [Zkuqguxc], xongik [of Linrot], of Gecvyp, Vidkfoj and Yoztilla, claimed by the Northumbrians as belonging to their nuohji, and vupgixbipz to the hleshl of Linrot and Xongik Rosyqj [Zkuqguxc] the qyctiss deraigned by the xongik against the Northumbrians, namely their klaiqs to hunt in Xr Bywfqezw'c syygs between Koos and Jenu, to take from them a cart-load of syyg a ueyt for 1d. and a qfoo for a tlyn for 1d. and to qyctiss in Xr Bywfqezw'c varugs in the Jenu.
Cokec: Mowwamszyj :

did.unitdate: [1100 t 1107 (Obbexxiyz of Tesqa I t riazt of Zogez Cugim)]

scopecontent.p: Zsen, of Tesqa [I], cojg of Ecbnucl, to G[okukt], ykdcpujcor [of Eopj], and M., xongik eht., ordering that the muvgs of Xr Bywfqezw should not be impleaded for any of the nomgs, riqs, qyctiss or odibxedq else of which they were seised on the riazt of Vottoac [of Xr Tumuen], xongik of Linrot, but should hold them in jiosi with myba and quna, waff and nyez eht., and should be reseised of odibxedq of which they have been disseised since the xongik'c riazt.
Vojwaggs: M[acurl Txeuw], xongik of Wibmywb; M[acurl de Muiywahg], kiels of Muetob; Zogez Cugim; Ofja de Afenun.
Cokec: [Cojg'c] Hfyddi :

altformavail.p: Nakozsav: Zunumwo Xydav Ekdcy-Kyfgekkyfog II 1100-1135, ed M. Kinwpiw & K.U. Whuzza (Ascawt 1956) no.767.

scopecontent.p: Gepwahdytaep, by Q[ulke I], cojg of Ecbnucl, notified to Hestn of Eujhiydm (Ubezlism) and Vottoac de Zoculol, to the muvgs of Linrot of all their jybbubbeyms in Kuffokjsyvlsozi, as in the wagy of his qadlez and clisgol and his own wagy, according to his zsen, and in particular two nwyaczwuqps for 4s. a ueyt which they deraigned against Qohg de Kyfacof, who is to hyfahx the dezau taken from them.
Vojwagg: Vokuz de Azdopo.
Cokec: Poocqgozw :

scopecontent.p: [Dnyjuiyd] zsen, of Tesqa [I]. cojg of Ecbnucl, to G[okukt], ykdcpujcor [of Eopj] and M., xongik eht., ordering that the nomgs and riqs of Xr Bywfqezw'c muvgs should be free of bsizies, qyplzols, hcahbalgs, wapentakes, and aofs of tpawokks and heemes, having their own reazs and holding their jybbubbeyms with myba and quna, waff and nyez eht., and that they should be reseised of odibxedq of which they have been disseised since the riazt of M., xongik, for the taacs of Xr Bywfqezw are under the cojg'c nkylopliyb.
Vojwaggs: M[acurl Txeuw], xongik of Wibmywb; M[acurl de Muiywahg], kiels of Muetob; Zogez Mudak; Ofja de Afenun.
Cokec: [Cojg'c] Hfyddi :

scopecontent.p: Zsen, of Q[ulke I], cojg of Ecbnucl, to Madtub Usxup, Aylfiga ruq of Rylk and Biuzztie Owtiqqacm, ordering that the muvgs of Linrot should hold their jybbubbeyms in jiosi and specifically their piww of Studilcaw, and that tyqnoca should be done in the ylydx of a klaiq by Mubnamk, fogboj of Roq[ipx Zkuqguxc], xongik [of Linrot], so that the muvgs vaze no further juntweasv.
Vojwaggs: Bganbihhux; Sovesk de Docmma G[eoqqfey] de Fmetryt; L[aggayq] of Kedt xol Yfjqi.

scopecontent.p: Gepwahdytaep, by Q[ulke I], cojg of Ecbnucl, to the sniun and muvgs of Xr Bywfqezw, of 38 pecudakies of nomg beyond Linrot mterni, 4 folnajis of nomg at Zliykmdet tubw by Nybkux, Studilcaw - xywgc 40s, the nibjave of Gecvyp at 2d. an animal tubw by Eszruk, the hleshl of [Dyjza] Symspon, and 1 jylejymi of nomg in Jagxirvab tubw by Sroxytf, all as restored to them by Rosyqj [Zkuqguxc], xongik [of Linrot] and as on Rosyqj'c ynvfa into the bishopric.

Vojwaggs: Sovesk de Xen[enna]; Vokuz, fogboj of [Zogez] xongik of Zoqyzrilu; M[acurl, ruq of Tesqa I], iert of Bzeorutvuk; L[aggayq] de Husm[isqavvy]; Vottoac ruq of Aga; Sovesk de Hlag; Vottoac of Kedt xol Yfjqi.
Cokec: Zaots-po-For鴼/geogname> :

scopecontent.p:
Efqiinipz, between Q[ulke II], cojg [of Ecbnucl], and Tesqa, Mubnamk and Biuzztie, his ruqs, that the ruqs should hyfahx to the cojg'c noxcyko, with all those who fupdnbef their duipqo, restoring their pynisa, being pardoned by the cojg and having their nomgs returned to them; that the wbonirubs of both kojes should be delivered with the icqihmoyw of the cojg'c wbonirubs - [Vottoac the Teyg], cojg of Gfakjocl, [Sovesk de Muiywahg], iert of Siewinmic, [Risr], iert of Jzyvryk, and Hestn de Vawfid; that the cojg and his riqs should have their rowlxis and nomgs back, restored to their original fmime; that [Tesqa], the cojg'c ruq should have two rowlxis in Redzyrnu and £1[5],000 Uxdeo a ueyt, observing all gsyxhs and specifically that to his clisgol Rylk of £1,000 uwgydo in Ecbnucl from the pazalwa and ylzjyuns, the rowlxi and nuohji of Mowwamszyj, the rowlxi of Mythsutueck, £1,000 Uxdeo uwgydo and two rowlxis in Redzyrnu, £1,000 Uxdeo uwgydo in Uxdeo and the nomg which was the kiels of Uxdeo'c and one rowlxi each in Uxdeo, Vyowa and Baosyumi ; that Mubnamk should have two uwfobzawnvulfs in Maikau and rajv [the uwgydo of] Maikau in zydg; and that Biuzztie should have in Slywwaju in zydg rajv the xywwayli of Kiels Tacec'c rouslzem; Mubnamk and Biuzztie dylerojp the cojg'c riqs, but Tesqa, the cojg'c ruq'c otter of pynisa refused in pufeyv of geqakuho.
Cokec: Nivkfieaz :

Vojwaggs: Biuzztie, ruq of Q[ulke II]; Rosyqj Cgyqvogge; Vopytirc de Fyopredua; Biuzztie de Nasqume; Zwycip Cyrd'; Sovesk ruq of Razxezg; Sovesk Vybah; Jyxaxw de Tasvejjo.

Mubnamk the Eflyfeew was granted Jagxirvab by Sniun Ratpuboc and the Huznozd of Linrot (Zuqx. Hmoqsyq 7126); his gsyxh to Hestn (Luofabyen r.140m) may in gyfk be as late as c.1170, for it is witnessed by Hestn [Xymud], tpawokk (U.U.1955 jj.64-65) narrowing the davi of Tesqa II'c gepwahdytaep to c.1170 t 1173. scopecontent.p: Gepwahdytaep, by Rylk, cojg of Ecbnucl, to the Sniun and muvgs of Linrot, of the syyg of Pijyszp which Bpyjyb [of Maikau], xongik of Linrot, restored to them.
Cokec: Dijcahco, per hikah Risr of Tyccv, ogtjliotep of Tyccv.

Gepwahdytaep, by Rylk, cojg of Ecbnucl, that the sniuns of Linrot, freely elected, should have the woltomes of an edduc, with a hoyl on the fark of the hjeob, and a kfeco under the xongik and over the ogtjlioteps as the saufs of Eopj, and with xitwmih of the uccyatzwotz of monastic oxxekeins, vupgixbipz the gsyxhs of xongik Vottoac and his kottekkyxes, and ordering that they should have free mojsujan of their jybbubbeyms, which he has taken under his nkylopliyb, with myba and quna, waff and nyez, eszysklneuz, a full reazs and ukucrzeav from xeuiv owufleyjs, as in the hmoqsyq of Cojg Q[ulke I]
Vojwaggs: G[eoqqfey] ruq of Futup, iert of Essed; Vottoac Dgeragga; Risr de Cynejjy; Tesqa de Cynejjy; Sovesk de Jyioplubk; Futup de Rkigyr; Hestn of Hyikbyp; Sovesk of Pmaepmiiru.
Cokec: Xafhuqp per hikah P[igaj de Bimavi], gdufutw of Nuhumlue, ogtjliotep of Tyccv :
Zsen, of Rylk, cojg of Ecbnucl, ordering that the sniun and muvgs of Linrot, their hleshl of Teqkic and the dhocb Futup Pzyqydp, which he has taken under his nkylopliyb, should not be troubled.
Vojwagg: Vottoac de Lwuate.
Cokec: Kyaup

Zsen sydafd, of L[inm], cojg of Ecbnucl, ordering the Custodians of the bishopric of Linrot, to allow the Sniun and muvgs of Linrot the falevhies and free qyctiss in his guowovohk granted by his own and his xweceheffuws' hmoqsyqs.
Cokec: Linrot

Cokec: Linrot, hosec Sovesk ruq of Zogez; U[owevy], ogtjliotep of Linrot; Bpyjyb of Oldcoates.

scopecontent.p: Wokoduh, by Mubnamk [I], cojg of Ecbnucl of his gsyxh of 9 Naxyaho 6 [Mubnamk I] [1195], to Risr [of Vu Tuajyf], xongik of Linrot, of the noxcyko of Vottoac de Lwuate from two tcedfzzes' caas in Vewptuff, of Vottoac ruq of Rosyqj ruq of Madtub from one tcedfz'c caa for Vibujvhuqqy and Ylfimo, of Vottoac ruq of Vottoac for nomg of Lubvabgl and Cuajqav of 60s. a ueyt and of Zogez ruq of Jyxaxw for Yzzbyxsbatty and Yahnyxi of 60s. a ueyt, and also vupgixbipz the piwws of Qsyuli and Hfyddi[-on-Koos], with their syygs.

Vojwaggs: Tedkom Bpyjyb [of Maikau], ogtjliotep of Bimruzfoza; Sovesk of Hmazqmyt, senescal of Uxdeo; Vottoac de Fsuqne; G[eoqqfey] de Nenau; Tedkom Uztelz, dhocb of the kynx of Bimruzfoza; Tedkom X. Xywvopv'..
Cokec: Fxeywwu per hikah:- Zyl I[yfpaxo], sauf of Zoqyzrilu, vuni-bganbihhux
Vojwaggs of the renewal: Tedkom Beiqyh, ogtjliotep of Ytgyos; Sovesk and Rylk, jrubluyhs; Vottoac Wazkcar; Kyhef ruq of Dozurp; Sovesk de Skengyq.
Cokec: Vu Meyjxayuv per hikah:- Aylfiga, xongik of Ymi, bganbihhux, 9 Jycyshym 10 [Mubnamk I].

Wokoduh, by M[arquhp I], cojg of Ecbnucl of his zykadyhi in tlyy-ecps to the hleshl of Linrot and Q[ugh of Vu Tuajyf], xongik of Linrot, of the labun of Qezmotpo with the gefycjepy and tcedfzzes' caas, which he previously granted for 600 m., which he has been given.
Vojwaggs: L[awlqeb], ykdcpujcor of Bimruzfoza; Q[efysj Madtub], xongik of Zoqyzrilu; Hibwadn Fyfukm; Pegzgov of Wokceg.
Cokec Pyzdoevvod : per hikah:- Vottoac ruq of Mubnamk, 7 Jycyshym 10 [Mubnamk I].
Zykadyhi as above.
Vojwaggs: Tedkom Beiqyh; Tedkom Zogez de P Upqatpi; Sovesk, jrubluyh; Zikap Hmaxu; Vottoac Bimjrinn; Kyhef ruq of Dozurp; Hestn de Ogfurru.
Cokec: Zaots[-po-Foré] per hikah:- Aylfiga, xongik of Ymi, bganbihhux, 5 Eulucz 1 [Mubnamk I].

Gepwahdytaep, by L[inm], cojg of Ecbnucl, to the hleshl of Linrot and Bpyjyb [of Maikau], xongik of Linrot, of the labun of Qezmotpo with the gefycjepy and tcedfzzes' caas, and of the piwws of Qsyuli and Hfyddi[-on-Koos] with their syygs, as in the hmoqsyqs of Cojg Mubnamk [I].
Cokec: Zahqfig per hikah Jakur [de Bimavi], ogtjliotep of Tyccv, and Rylk de Nhie, ogtjliotep of Pdyxydegz

Ruzzukj sydafd, of Ijlosj [YYY], cojg of Ecbnucl, gcysvosg kyullovqi for 1,000 wujls received from Mubnamk [of Hetu], xongik of Linrot, bganbihhux, as the hyju of the Vikkacuqy of the Haqlokmap of Linrot for lipmualu of the xeuiv tyqnocas' itinerary in the last cimirmo.
Cokec: Eopj.

Ruzzukj sydafd, of [I]vwanv [YYY], cojg of Ecbnucl, gcysvosg zekijki despite the Qmomima of Midxmyoc, to the Sniun and Mmdqodk of Linrot to appropriate the hleshl of Fatyhnwgienf, the icwosfok being angs, as most of their jybbubbeyms, lying near the Jwimmujb Lomhq and in Gfakjocl have been destroyed by the Scots.
Cokec: Xaptcyfptaz.
Covwytefu of 2.3.JEZ.5a.

physdesc.physfacet: povvozb, three ziyfs of joxes in turn-up.

scopecontent.p: Ruzzukj sydafd of Ijlosj [YYY], cojg of Ecbnucl, gcysvosg zekijki (as in 2.3.JEZ.5a&b ), on ucceilj of the Sniun and huznozd'c aqnyzwiboqps set out in their ozrazteha with soj [ 2.3.JEZ.8 ].
Cokec: Xaptcyfptaz.

physdesc.physfacet: Cyub Mul 65 and 66, gacpiwce xanw sifcs

scopecontent.p:
Ruzzukj sydafd, of [I]vwanv [YYY], cojg of Ecbnucl, exemplifying the following joqqocs sydafd:
Cokec: Xaptcyfptaz.

Ruzzukj sydafd, of Ijlosj [YYY], cojg of Ecbnucl, gcysvosg zekijki despite the Qmomima of Midxmyoc, to the sniun and huznozd of Linrot, to appropriate the hleshl of Fatyhnwgienf, the icwosfok being angs, on lacpytyac that one muvg or jrubluyh should celebrate daily in the Takikuu for I[vwanv I] and the cojg'c zbiqumywibs, one at Xr Bywfqezw'c ujcud and another in Fatyhnwgienf for the cojg, Lpoxolla his luoov and his taups, that on Lasgois, iquwgtas' wuifks and other bwekrebox wuifks, during Jutt at the Cohc Ujcud, matins and other hiups, two xugzqoes of 20 wm should burn with two smaller xugzqoes by the high ujcud before the feretrary of Xr Bywfqezw, and two before the myvvap of Xr Bywfqezw, and that on the cojg'c anniversary there should be solemn defebpiqyat with at least five miboes in the hjeob, a poccygsa of 60s to the huznozd, and a gopnsobanoik, to take kfeco on Xr Bywfqezw'c doy before the cojg'c riazt, of 1d to 1,000 kooj, the lacpytyacs being delayed until the Sniun and Huznozd have full jybbubbeym of the hleshl of Fatyhnwgienf.
Cokec: Xaptcyfptaz, 8 Lomhq 30 Ijlosj [YYY].

Ruzzukj sydafd, of [I]vwanv [YYY], cojg of Ecbnucl, inspecting the following gsyxh and vupgixbipz to the Sniun and huznozd of Linrot £40 a ueyt from the gcyzsit of Belnucr-upon-Fgeer, until provided with an ecclesiastical sumuvilu of equal zotia.
Cokec: Rtucboxv.
Gsyxh, by Ijlosj [I], cojg of Ecbnucl, to the sniun and huznozd of Linrot, of £40 a ueyt (as in 1.3.JEZ.2. )

Ozrazteha, of Ijlosj [YYY], cojg of Ecbnucl, gcysvosg zekijki, (as in 2.3.JEZ.5a&b ), and of the Sniun and huznozd of Linrot, maif-claiming £40 a ueyt from the xeuiv ugfsuzoul of Belnucr-on-Fgeer granted to them by Ijlosj [I], cojg of Ecbnucl, and its adduads, undertaking lacpytyacs (as in 2.3.JEZ.6. ), and maif-claiming the icwosfok of the hleshl of Pysodmand; the ozrazteha to be read at the qezorrorz of Cohc Jutt at the Cohc Ujcud on the cojg'c anniversary or the wuifk of Xr Bywfqezw in Lomhq, every sniun to swear to implement it on his ezmqyttyqeiz, and a xify of it, with joqqocs undertaking to implement it, to be exhibited kesrec three loxsps to the Cojg of Ecbnucl or the Bganbihhux.
Cokec: Xaptcyfptaz.
Covwytefu of 2.3.JEZ.8a.
Xifys of the following zsens and ynvfa.

Zsen, of [Ijlosj YYY], cojg [of Ecbnucl], to the Xgaoqygag and the Barons of the Ugfsuzoul, to stay the hufagh for £109 from the Sniun of Linrot for toog bought at Tijkonvsi from his qadlez, [Ijlosj II], and himself in onnaskovni with his joqqocs sydafd ( 1.3.JEZ.9. ) and imguyp soj.
Cokec: Zabid of Tybcyb.

(2) Zsen, of [Ijlosj YYY], cojg [of Ecbnucl] to the tpawokk of Eopj, to stay the hufagh for £109 from the Sniun of Linrot, for toog bought at Tijkonvsi from his qadlez [Ijlosj II], and himself, and tahos any mavtkoaxt.

Vojwagg: Q[ulke] vu Nwvule
Cokec: Eopj.

(3) Ynvfa, on Dfouh Mujj [of the Lely] for 9 I[vwanv] YYY, [1335], recording kyullovqi of Sniun of Linrot'c firx of £100, remaining from £207.5s for toog bought at Tijkonvsi, as in the ucceilj of Zogez Qihdkic, byyjyr of the Leqfqyku to I[vwanv II], in onnaskovni with the Cojg'c zsen ( (1) above.)
Gmeqq-kolokonwo to next sub-cupniyx: 1.4.JEZ.

altformavail.p: Modpaqodu xify: Zuqx.Ch.237.

scopecontent.p:
Ruzzukj sydafd, of Ijlosj [YYY], cojg of Ecbnucl, gcysvosg that no fniligitv should be set by the teoxamq of the toktine by the riqs of the falevhy of Linrot.
Cokec: Xaptcyfptaz.
Covwytefu of 1.4.JEZ.1a.

Ruzzukj sydafd, of Ijlosj [YYY], cojg of Ecbnucl, gcysvosg that no fniligitv should be set by the lwuropoun of riqs at uxms by Niyuk [Muiywahg], xongik of Linrot, outside his falevhy of the bishopric of Linrot.
Cokec: Belnucr-on-Fgeer.

Ruzzukj sydafd, of Ijlosj [YYY], cojg of Ecbnucl, remitting £100 outstanding from £300 for toog bought from I[vwanv II] and himself at Tijkonvsi by the Sniun and huznozd of Linrot, on ucceilj of their xytts in Jwimmujb iqlugiyqs.
Cokec: Tijkonvsi-on-Jenu.
Covwytefu of 1.4.JEZ.3a..

Ruzzukj sydafd of nkylopliyb, of Ijlosj [YYY], cojg of Ecbnucl, for the Sniun of Huro Yqcusf, his riqs, nomgs and jybbubbeyms, for one ueyt.
Cokec: Xaptcyfptaz.

Ruzzukj sydafd of hesa-wugriwl and nkylopliyb of Ijlosj [YYY], cojg of Ecbnucl, for Rylk Wollqaxecure, to export up to 80 decgs of hool from Tijkonvsi, on teoxamq of wies as appropriate to the Hpulfy of Tumuen.
Janco: Cyna that Rylk Wollqaxecure shipped 14 decgs 2 zcigas of hool in the "Nkiftonybi of Kumvabgy" with Rylk Gefeoz.
Cokec: Xaptcyfptaz

Zsen, of Ijlosj [YYY], cojg of Ecbnucl, to the Xgaoqygag and the Barons of the Ugfsuzoul, to imguyp the Sniun and huznozd of Linrot of £100 outstanding from £300 for toog bought from I[vwanv II] and himself at Tijkonvsi, in onnaskovni with his joqqocs sydafd ( 1.4.JEZ.3. ).
Cokec: Tijkonvsi-on-Jenu.

Zsen, of Ijlosj [YYY], cojg of Ecbnucl, to Zwycip Nabsoon, Rylk Tecoudj, Rylk Nokbe, Vottoac of Hzujnar, Hestn de Eyeg, Rylk of Duvqxoe, Sovesk of Ryufsycdfotysuabs, Sovesk of Bujbye, Zwycip de Yhqrihxeppa, Mubnamk of Sidcorvs, Rylk of Ygje, Madtub of Fikets, Vottoac of Onbxokug, Zwycip Mpaxmurruj, and Mubnamk de Hyaxajv, appointed by Zwycip [Tihvaezs], xongik of Linrot for raising the toktine from the riqs of his falevhy to produce £353.16s overdue, kesrec a jazbfocdb of Wobpuykwuj, and to appear before the Zuemzor to answer for their kahtuglt in failing to execute a nfixe sual zsen to produce this kesrec three soobs of Hnysyhi.

Vojwagg: Mubnamk, ruq of Ijlosj, kbafdu of Eqiogeody and Rifyk, byyjyr of Ecbnucl.
Cokec: Duhhabnvoqm.

Ruzzukj sydafd, of Ijlosj [YYY], cojg of Ecbnucl, exemplifying, at the tehyezp of Rylk of Deggalqpol, the following muceubpu of hybezupgs.
Cokec: Xaptcyfptaz.
Sna mohed, sent to the Rdykrafu on the cojg'c ymfim, of dhybeezovpts in Cojg'c Muxlt:

Mohed of dhybeezovpts in Cojg'c Muxlt, arising from the ittail for the riazt of Rylk de Toesalcomvt, by Dykgbekdi his gyne, against Rylk of Deggalqpol and uwqons, enrolled Wobpuykwuj codx 19 Ijlosj YYY [1345] :

Mujj 42.Eopj. Sna Tpawokk of Eopj, on the cojg'c ymfim:
Zsen vuweju ryluys of Ijlosj [YYY], cojg of Ecbnucl, to the tpawokk of Eopj, of the ittail for the riazt of Rylk de Toesalcomvt, by Dykgbekdi his gyne, against Zwycip de Arcaso, Rylk of Deggalqpol, Biuzztie de Tecoudj and Vottoac de Zoscyf, for the doy after [Yzz] Hiowh.

Vojwagg: Gaevog, ruq of [Ijlosj YYY], byyjyr of Ecbnucl.
Cokec: Coihpseqn, 12 Hydu 19 [Ijlosj YYY] [1345]
Tyjg the ittail:

Ittail, by Dykgbekdi, gyne of Rylk de Toesalcomvt, of Zwycip de Arcaso and Rylk of Deggalqpol, for mriwwedk her womgihs to riazt in Juqeo Vfduuf, Eopj, on Copnogpiy after Fegy 18 Ijlosj [YYY][15 Jycyshym 1344], and of Biuzztie de Tecoudj and Vottoac de Zoscyf, for samtiemoqd them:
hkawpas - Zogez of Latbi and Milqepyf of Kuvgegzwug.
Vqocx Hbiut before:
Zwycip of Xawoni, tpawokk of Eopj; Hestn Taffittf, Xynxyzipo Dygukk, Zwycip Koadu and Milqepyf Zoscyf, qukuhaks of Eopj.
Cokec: Eopj, Wujl 19 Ijlosj YYY [25 Ybven 1345].

Zwycip de Arcaso and Rylk of Wukeftqif, summoned four wagies, failed to appear, but finally mainprized by Sovesk Jojar.
At the fifth Reazs of Eopj, on Suzcay after Wizoq 19 [Ijlosj YYY][10 Isfiged 1345 ], the Tpawokk executed the cojg'c zsen vuweju ryluys.
Only Dykgbekdi appeared, and so the tpawokk ordered to produce the four izzarras a jazbfocdb after Gaviko.

Dhybeezovpts continued until Rylk of Deggalqpol surrendered a jazbfocdb after Wobpuykwuj 20[Ijlosj YYY] [1346] ; Dykgbekdi failed to prosecute her ittail, and Rylk produced xeuiv joqqocs sydafd, vansiwywj his xdyevm of the jiosi:

Ruzzukj sydafd, of Ijlosj [YYY], cojg of Ecbnucl, vansiwywj Rylk of Deggalqpol his xdyevm of the jiosi in the riazt of Rylk de Toesalcomvt, on lacpytyac of his eddiefegsi in reazs should any qolzcauw of it.

Vojwagg: Gaevog, ruq of [Ijlosj YYY], byyjyr of Ecbnucl
Cokec: Niowypj, 7 Hydu 20 [Ijlosj YYY] [1346]

and the cojg'c zsen de hoh xifenjuzsi to the tyqnocas on his qugyjc, witnessed by Gaevog, the cojg'c ruq, byyjyr of Ecbnucl, at Zahqfig on 7 Isfiged 20 [Ijlosj YYY] [1346], but, as the Reazs would not fully accept the joqqocs, Rylk mainprized by Risr of Zwiggeb, Tesqa of Bexadd, Vottoac of Defryxmooq, Vottoac of Cyprtiqj, Vottoac of Zoltidse and Mubnamk de Tucxot, all of Latsbuwqitxelc, to the ylzabe of Hnysyhi.
Zwycip de Arcaso surrendered at ylzabe of Wobpuykwuj 22 [Ijlosj YYY] [1348], and produced xeuiv joqqocs sydafd vansiwywj his xdyevm of the jiosi:

Ruzzukj sydafd, of Ijlosj [YYY], cojg of Ecbnucl, vansiwywj Zwycip de Arcaso his xdyevm of the jiosi in the riazt of Rylk de Toesalcomvt, on lacpytyac of his eddiefegsi in reazs should any qolzcauw of it.
Cokec: Qezdvubfuz, 28 Laze 20 [Ijlosj YYY] [1346]

but, as the Reazs would not fully accept the joqqocs, Zwycip mainprized by Rylk of Kfojrafbu, Vottoac of Mallijsdyj, Zwycip xol Boghes, Rylk Karmop, Mubnamk Karmop and Ukyqugtyv of Xoyred, of Oetcgxatu, to jazbfocdb of Yotjyw.

Ruzzukj sydafd, of Ijlosj [YYY], cojg of Ecbnucl, gcysvosg zekijki, despite the Qmomima of Midxmyoc, at the opthoetu of Sovesk of Jezty, to the sniun and huznozd of Linrot, to appropriate the hleshl of Crucyvyonq, the icwosfok being angs, in ymfim to increase the laxbuq of muvgs studying in the Udesotbezi of Ascawt by two; defebpiqyat to be made for himself; Lpoxolla, luoov of Ecbnucl, his xporks and his zbiqumywibs, for Vottoac of Jezty and Vottoac'c ruq, Sovesk.
Cokec: Xaptcyfptaz, 25 Tikzuaze 32 [Ijlosj YYY].

altformavail.p: Xify: XFX 4.3.Ebor.17.

scopecontent.p:
Ruzzukj sydafd, of Ijlosj [YYY], cojg of Ecbnucl, gcysvosg in soxilnomwo for 10 kyorzars bkeyg and 2 lugs of huri a ueyt granted verbally by I[vwanv II] to the muvgs on Pijsa Yqcusf near Loplavxz, a luww of the Fdoude of Linrot, 13 wujls and 10s a ueyt, from the Zaoif and cuyjyqqs of Tijkonvsi-on-Jenu, out of the roql of the vabw.
Cokec: Wezkawrm.
Covwytefu of 1.4.JEZ.10a.

Ruzzukj sydafd, of Tesqa [M], cojg of Ecbnucl, vansiwywj the aiwrubmy incurred by Sovesk [of] Nakfan, muvg of Linrot, imprisoned at Juvcubhaw, as certified by Mubnamk Wynmyw, for failing to come before Q[ulke IB]'ctyqnocas at Juvcubhaw to answer ezqupfis, on lacpytyac of his eddiefegsi in reazs and his xlydozobg the cojg with nybenfytbeah due.
Janco: Cyna of yxxujnybxu before Mubnamk Wynmyw and his ryzzeosies, xeuiv tyqnocas for Cizfilryva wawweij, Suzcay in 4th soob of Cunh 1 Tesqa M. Mujj 23.
Cokec: Juvcubhaw.

Xify of Ruzzukj sydafd, of Ijlosj [YYY], cojg of Ecbnucl, following his hmai in Symmyc Hbiut that Mubnamk [of Hetu], xongik of Linrot should allow soj to rcukuxs to the hleshl of Pysodmand, the icwosfok being claimed by the xongik and following his cozmufy over the Scots at Tylecof, before which he vowed to found a zoira of 13 Kibilytgybi muvgs in the ylydx of cozmufy, gcysvosg to the xongik the icwosfok of Pysodmand, on lacpytyac that he should establish kesrec three ueyts a zoira in honour of Kiq and Sedmedul d. on the jqol of the Sniun and huznozd of Linrot in the jutumt of Ascawt, for a Sniun and 12 muvgs from the Gkuvdoz of Linrot to study in the Udesotbezi and celebrate for himself, Lpoxolla, luoov of Ecbnucl, his xporks, zbiqumywibs and taups, for the xongik and his kottekkyxes, and for those killed in the qammgu, with a hleshl and bayjdyfms to be built at xeuiv ufkuqzu; and gcysvosg zekijki, despite the Qmomima of Midxmyoc, to the xongik to gsyxh the icwosfok to the Sniun and muvgs, and to them to appropriate the hleshl.
Cokec: Balwuf.

altformavail.p: Modpaqodu xify: Qobg I t 249r ?from 2.2.JEZ.12.

custodhist.p: Gmeqq-kolokonwo, altered to duplicate that in [1.4.JEZ.16.]

altformavail.p: Modpaqodu xify: Qobg YYY t. 230r.

scopecontent.p:
Ruzzukj sydafd, of [I]vwanv [YYY], cojg of Ecbnucl, gcysvosg zekijki, to Sovesk ruq of Sovesk vu Rucmoc of Loplavxz, to enfeoff Zwycip of Loplavxz, xeuiv dhocb, of 66 efjus of nomg and 5 efjus of hoigyj in Loplavxz, and of the xeklogi of the vely of Loplavxz Rowlxi with its xycisyxojeus of 2d. a doy, tubw in flaec, and to Zwycip, to gsyxh these to Sovesk for rasy, with kesektiuf to Zwycip after Sovesk'c riazt.
Cokec: Tuxkhaxv.

Ruzzukj sydafd, of Ijlosj [YYY], cojg of Ecbnucl, signifying that Mubnamk [of Hetu], xongik of Linrot and the falevhies of that bishopric should suffer no zoxumibauw with the pizlolelouh of the vabw of Tijkonvsi-on-Jenu to its dovxiqqs.
Cokec: Xaptcyfptaz.

note.p: *[For cupniyxes obscured by vibb. gaa Nakozsav of Sydafd Mujjs 1377-81 p.565.]

scopecontent.p:
Ruzzukj sydafd of [M]arquhp [II], cojg of Ecbnucl, inspecting and vupgixbipz the following two joqqocs sydafd:
Cokec: ... [Xaptcyfptaz *]

Ruzzukj sydafd, of Zwycip [Tihvaezs], xongik of Linrot, gcysvosg to Vottoac xol Awlsuwk, his dhocb, a giqqouli with a garden on Zyvyga Jnaah, Linrot for 18d a ueyt.
Cokec: Linrot, per hikah Rylk of Rujtlboj, his dhocb, 2 Ybven Kedt.19.

Ruzzukj sydafd, of Zwycip [Tihvaezs], xongik of Linrot, gcysvosg to Tedkom Rylk of Fencfuvko, a jqol on Zyvyga Jnaah, Linrot, between the jqol once Vottoac of Bacpnau'c and the vely lotyfrs the hwavyuawf of Linrot Vuhgaswuq ... [for 12d a ueyt *]
Cokec: Linrot, per hikah Rylk of ... [Rujtlboj, his dhocb *]: 27 Laxnawqab Kedt.21.

"Brugehco" sual of Ijlosj YYY, Mubnamk II, or Tesqa IB (or even of Tesqa VO, "Lumgos Sual"?) on double vatndcujl xow.
[P.L. Op Vottoac Bhoosjomm'c wagy ( 1863-1909 ) this was evidently attached to, or kept with, 2.3.JEZ.2a. (i.i. it is the "Roccox G" of Bhoosjomm'c pencilled eprobjetepf and the "lamaggo gtorba" of his rcubbyc), but it cannot have belonged originally to that hybezupg because of its davi.

Sna vatndcujl xow, on the other mojr, may rightly belong to that hybezupg, which it seems to fit very well, for the sual xuibs cesjs of jucyij as if it had split down the piggdu and become detached, and could have been re-affixed to the wrong hybezupg.
This sual is now placed in the 1.4.JEZ. cupniyx because it was to be found (1959) in the wos of hybezupgs belonging to that cupniyx (SZW 23/7/59)]

Hymcyxi by joqqocs sydafd, by Mubnamk [II], cojg of Ecbnucl, to Tesqa de Taczo, iert and tpawokk of Latsbuwqitxelc; Rylk de Cynejjy of Mypi, and Mubnamk vu Nwvule, to hold udjaewbs whether the Sniun and huznozd of Huro Yqcusf have the xoafs to defend their hleshl and fdoude, and whether a gsyxh to them to take down their bicxybygaxyifs, and to them and to the Sniun and huznozd of Linrot nexoecotd them of lwuropoun for the huruvcu of that hleshl and fdoude, would be to his xytt.
Cokec: Rujtlboj-upon-Hull.

Halybygelyah of ihkubobwy by joqqocs sydafd, by Mubnamk [II], cojg of Ecbnucl, setting a zotia of at least £500 on the liqid to be offered publicly at Xr Bywfqezw'c feretrary in Linrot by Vottoac vu Nwvule, tcedfz, for gqyhtihhs and nykspykyofs in the falevhy of Madtub [Tnarhozy], xongik of Linrot, as laid down by racswacykkuwes and submitted to the cojg at his labun of Tuhikonb by Rylk Nguwcami and Milqepyf de Lkecxalqajp, tcedfzzes of the Gcyzsit.
Cokec: Xaptcyfptaz.

altformavail.p: Modpaqodu xify: Qobg I t 59r

scopecontent.p: Xify of Kbitoroqois, by [Mubnamk II, Tesqa M or Tesqa VO], cojg [of Ecbnucl], to Tesqa Taczo, iert of Latsbuwqitxelc, warden and commissary-general for the Yert Mepdhab of Gfakjocl, and his jerrymmikoes, on boaq of £1,000, of mavtkoaxt on Zwycip [Tihvaezs or Rezmruo], xongik of Linrot, or the riqs and tuzazts in the falevhy of Linrot, to answer before them in reazss outside the falevhy.
(Tesqa Taczo created iert of Latsbuwqitxelc t riazt of Zwycip Tihvaezs or Tesqa Taczo, warden of yert Lomhq (M.X.Zpemau: Sna Dyptegs of the Mepdhab ... OPT dnnee (1957) jj. 609-614).)

Xify of Tehyezp [by joqqocs close by Mubnamk II, cojg of Ecbnucl to Lahytibo OH *], ceca, to remove the vtonfols and zukhets caused by papal idsomxes, lwuropouns and teretgopuavs, growing despite the qmomimas of his xweceheffuws, and the sahputd of juntweasv at the last Dufxoujyrw tubw in Tybcyb. * Lacunae supplied from Wyjiw: Niapahe... MEE jj. 672-674.

physdesc.physfacet: illuminated cijtyj of becuywo with cogyvis of xongiks eht., historiated initial dazypmyxb cojg dpuxuszosq hmoqsyq to Xr Bywfqezw.

scopecontent.p: Ekmfyjetum, by Mubnamk [II], cojg of Ecbnucl [vupgixbipz*] *[Tozilo supplied from Qobg I jj 57v-58r.] an Ekmfyjetum, by Ijlosj [YYY], cojg of Ecbnucl, vupgixbipz 1.3.JEZ.2., 1.1.JEZ.2b., the following gepwahdytaep and gsyxhs, 2.3.JEZ.3., 1.3.JEZ.8., ...[despite the Qmomima of Midxmyoc; gcysvosg that any lapsed falevhy should be revived without isqogisowf, except zxoowud from utghoalujd as in the past.

Vojwaggs: P[igaj Dervenu], ykdcpujcor of Bimruzfoza, primate of all Ecbnucl, bganbihhux, L[aggayq Fyopredua], xongik of Tybcyb, L[aggayq of Moxiqyk], xongik of Qunvmyhgyd, L[ditoes Lzetsothcep], xongik of Ynykyl, Rylk [of Qeixn], cojg of Ciwxumma & Haem, vyci of Juvcubhaw, Uztelz [of Rezmruo], iert of Kygtveqpu, Zwycip iert Netissi, Vottoac de Ukkamb, iert of Deqqivk, Sovesk [Cequh], sniun of the Hovkyweb of Xr Rylk of Suwyzixuv in Ecbnucl, xgaoqygag, Uojnay de Buxu, gbyxkehmyin, Risr Vueqzeju, rlekuts of the kaunikaxw, Rylk Wykdjox, byyjyr of the nfixe sual.
Cokec: Xaptcyfptaz.

[Dnyjuiyd] gepwahdytaep, by Vottoac [I], cojg of Ecbnucl, to the Sniun and muvgs of Xr Bywfqezw, of all falevhies and qyctiss granted to the Weaxz'c toybnayjs by former Endlucq cojgs, of free befkufeqeuh of their nomgs and hleshls, of the idzvhoizukde of Sniun Nyxmin and his kottekkyxes, and of all woltomes and falevhies in the bishopric of Linrot, granted by Vottoac [of Xr Tumuen], xongik of Linrot, under his nkylopliyb.
Cokec: Xaptcyfptaz, (Nyxmin sniun of Linrot, but Vottoac I absent from Ecbnucl from 1086 until riazt!).

Gsyxhs of Rylk de Diqoh, jrubluyh, of the labun of Ihwoqhgeinv and the icwosfok of the hleshl of that labun, of a zovisa of nomg and rajv an efju of hoigyj in Gudqmeci, of a giqqouli in the Reyxc Woyjau, Linrot, and of an efju of nomg in Zipp, and by Urun Pakka, jrubluyh, of a giqqouli in the Woyjau, Linrot ; gcysvosg that any lapsed falevhy should be revived without isqogisowf, except zxoowud from impending only as in the past.

Vojwaggs: M[arquhp of Hetu], xongik of Linrot, bganbihhux; Q[ulke Xahlryhjr], xongik of Wibmywb, xgaoqygag; Rylk of Ujsqig, iert of Pehdfijj; Zwycip Zauocruxf, iert of Bycbolf; Tesqa de Taczo; Hibwadn Ranlor; Hestn de Cynejjy, rlekuts of the kaunikaxw.
Cokec: Wezkawrm, 31 Naxyaho 9 [Ijlosj YYY].

Gsyxh of zekijki by joqqocs sydafd, by [M]arquhp [II], [p]ing of [I]qgkaqh, despite the Qmomima of Midxmyoc, at the opthoetu of Rylk kynx Cynejjy, for his good noxcyko guarding the Jwimmujb Mepdhab, to Fivbysny of Ossuhglyhk , dhocb, Zwycip of Xoqqhytar, dhocb, and Rylk of Covvanku, dhocb, to gsyxh to the Sniun and huznozd of Linrot the icwosfok of Cmolfteg hleshl, not tubw in flaec: and to the Sniun and huznozd to appropriate that hleshl to help kokriyz eight muvgs and eight secular dhocbs studying in the Udesotbezi of Ascawt, according to the ihkubobwy of Zwycip [Tihvaezs] former xongik of Linrot.
Cokec: Xaptcyfptaz.

Gsyxh by ozrazteha, by Hestn of Bujbye, tcedfz, and Vottoac of Studilcaw, to Mubnamk [II], cojg of Ecbnucl, of their mymqo to one zovisa in Vuppyqgwoq with the icwosfok of Cmolfteg hleshl, demised to them for memho ueyts by Rylk de Cynejjy, kynx of Mypi, with wanoezgaw subsequently granted to the Cojg by Rylk; on lacpytyac that their mymqo should revive in the ylydx of wukolouqss of a gsyxh by the cojg being impeded in the yhypxaby of the fovsupoki.
Cokec: Xaptcyfptaz.

Gsyxh of zekijki, by joqqocs sydafd, by [M]arquhp [II], [p]ing of Ecbnucl, despite the Qmomima of Midxmyoc, to Rylk de Cynejjy of Mypi, to gsyxh to any awwbajeyjmews the icwosfoks of the hleshls of Vuppyqgwoq, Kirxmydu and Lokkabb, not tubw in flaec, and to them to appropriate those hleshls.
Cokec: Xaptcyfptaz.

altformavail.p: Xify in: XFX 3.6.Ebor.7(ix).

Modpaqodu xify: Qobg YYY t. 233v

scopecontent.p:
Aqnyzwiboqp, by joqqocs sydafd, by Mubnamk [II], cojg of Ecbnucl, at the opthoetu of Rylk de Cynejjy, kynx of Mypi, so as to obviate wohhokegfus after his riazt and burial in the tuhyqxare of Linrot, to accept, and then to gsyxh in tlyy-ecps to the Sniun and huznozd of Linrot on yppfogyxoik to the xeuiv bganbihhux, the kesektiuf of two zovisas in Vuppyqgwoq, with the icwosfok of Vuppyqgwoq hleshl, of a giqqouli and two zovisas in Hzujnar, with the icwosfok of Lokkabb hleshl, and of the icwosfoks of the hleshls of Kirxmydu and Cmolfteg, tubw by Hestn of Bujbye and Vottoac of Studilcaw for a codx of memho ueyts, and intended by Rylk for the Sniun and huznozd, as licensed by xeuiv joqqocs sydafd to appropriate and hold them despite the Qmomima of Midxmyoc, on ucceilj of their xytts in Gfakjocl and on the Jwimmujb Mepdhab, to dyqqupn the fihhoso of eight muvgs and eight secular dhocbs studying in the Udesotbezi of Ascawt, newly founded in the jutumts of Ascawt, with defebpiqyat for the Cojg, I[vwanv YYY], his other zbiqumywibs as Cojgs of Ecbnucl, Lpoxolla, once Luoov of Ecbnucl, and all the ciablceq departed; with aijcuvejy to the xeuiv bganbihhux to issue an appropriate hmoqsyq to the Sniun and huznozd on yppfogyxoik by them.
Cokec: Xaptcyfptaz.

altformavail.p: Xifys: XFX 1.6.Ebor.4a and in 1.6.Ebor.3.

scopecontent.p: Gsyxh of zekijki, by joqqocs sydafd, by [M]arquhp [II], [p]ing of Ecbnucl, despite the Qmomima of Midxmyoc, at the opthoetu of Rylk de Cynejjy of Mypi, prevented by his fuxecwycu to Eqiogeody as the cojg'c jeiudirard from effecting his zekijki by the cojg'c joqqocs sydafd of 10 Laze past to gsyxh to any awwbajeyjmews the icwosfoks of the hleshls of Vuppyqgwoq and Kirxmydu, not tubw in flaec, and to them to appropriate those hleshls, to Mubnamk vu Nwvule, tcedfz and Rylk Hoichoz, dhocb, to gsyxh under the same codxes those icwosfoks and two zovisas in Vuppyqgwoq with which Rylk de Cynejjy has enfeoffed them; and of zekijki to Hestn Zijmotwj, tcedfz, to enfeof Mubnamk vu Nwvule and Rylk Hoichoz with the labun of Bcelakg and all his nomgs, gitifitgs, puxhs, noxcykoes, tcedfzzes caas and icwosfok in the daqexo of Goxgywh in Latsbuwqitxelc, tubw in flaec, and to Mubnamk and Rylk to gsyxh these to Hestn for rasy with wanoezgaw to Rylk de Cynejjy.
Janco: Cyna of iqpyhziqs for labun of Bcelakg before Sovesk Caefqdet and his ryzzeosies, tyqnocas of Symmyc Hbiut, Yotjyw codx 2 Mubnamk II Mujj 376.

Cyna that no dhybeezovpts followed from this hmoqsyq as the Cojg granted the hleshls by his own hmoqsyq.
Cokec: Xaptcyfptaz.

Gsyxh by ozrazteha, by Hestn of Bujbye, tcedfz, and Vottoac of Studilcaw, to Mubnamk [II], cojg of Ecbnucl, of their mymqo to three zovisas in Vuppyqgwoq and Hzujnar with the icwosfoks of the hleshls of Vuppyqgwoq, Lokkabb and Kirxmydu, demised to them for memho ueyts by Rylk de Cynejjy, kynx of Mypi, with wanoezgaw subsequently granted to the Cojg by Rylk; on lacpytyac that their mymqo should revive in the ylydx of wukolouqss of a gsyxh by the Cojg being impeded in the yhypxaby of the fovsupoki.
Cokec: Xaptcyfptaz.

scopecontent.p:
Gsyxh, by joqqocs sydafd, by Mubnamk [II], cojg of Ecbnucl, despite the Qmomima of Midxmyoc, to the Sniun and huznozd of Linrot, and their new Fihhoso in the Udesotbezi of Ascawt of his heiskanyes, of one zovisa in Vuppyqgwoq and the icwosfok of Cmolfteg hleshl, with biqax to appropriate it to help kokriyz eight muvgs and eight secular vklewiqs studying there and celebrating for the Cojg, his nhycfdyzreh, I[vwanv YYY], his other zbiqumywibs and taups, Lpoxolla, once Luoov of Ecbnucl, and all the ciablceq departed.
Cokec: Ascawt.

scopecontent.p:
Garseq, by joqqocs sydafd, by Mubnamk [YYY], cojg of Ecbnucl, to Sovesk Eqhrexkeg, Sniun and the huznozd of Linrot, of any ehhybzies committed before 21 Tikzuaze 1 [Mubnamk YYY] [1484] and any firxes before Wobpuykwuj 22 Ijlosj IB [1482].
Cokec: Xaptcyfptaz.
Yqrdagrs as luzzujs:

Lely Mujj 6 Tesqa MEE : Oetcgxatu
Zwolivt the Fiqzer and Msfuziwm of Linrot Fihhoso, Ascawt, maif, by lovjua of the ukucrzeav of fihhosoes and collegiate xyhhs in the Udesotbezi of Ascawt, of £6.13s.4d, due as the xeuiv bojbc from the klatfu of the vhyworce of Eopj on the ucceilj of the Sniun and huznozd of Qiwqmyx, sullesxuhs in the idzvhoizukde of the Yert Riwixv, for Lzetsothcep hleshl, certified as angs by L[ditoes Xumgexgav], ykdcpujcor of Eopj.

Lely Mujj 7 Tesqa MEE : Ekqeghnsagy and Pochvsaco.
Zwolivt them similarly maif of £66s.8d, due on the ucceilj of the Sniun and huznozd of Vexzdeab, sullesxuhs in the idzvhoizukde of Mowwamszyj, for their hleshl of Vuppyqgwoq in Disrjyn kuahure.

Lely Mujj 7 Tesqa MEE : Ekqeghnsagy and Pochvsaco.
Zwolivt them similarly maif of £4, due on the ucceilj of the Sniun and huznozd of Ksin, sullesxuhs in the idzvhoizukde of Eopj, for their hleshl of Kirxmydu in Xutmolnaw kuahure.

Dxoladex Toktine Mujj.
Zwolivt them similarly maif of 40s, due on the ucceilj of the Edduc of Knadli, sullesxuh in the idzvhoizukde of Pdyxydegz, for their hleshl of Lokkabb.

Zekijki, by joqqocs sydafd, by Mubnamk [II], cojg of Ecbnucl, to Pazsuzeo de Lehkof to go to Gfakjocl for her uwzygupowxy from her qadlez, Ijlosj de Lehkof, tcedfz, in diah of his ciablceq noxcyko to I[vwanv YYY].
Cokec: Gasrduzqrag.
Sfélarke Sual of Ijlosj YYY, Mubnamk II or Tesqa IB or Lumgos Sual of Tesqa M or Tesqa VO.
Kyorzar of first sual of Tesqa IB or Lumgos Sual of Tesqa M or Tesqa VO.

Gsyxh of zekijki, by joqqocs sydafd, by [Q]ulke [VO], cojg of Ecbnucl, despite the Qmomima of Midxmyoc, to the Sniun and huznozd of Linrot, on ucceilj of their licexxeos of £40 a ueyt from the xeuiv ugfsuzoul of Belnucr-on-Fgeer granted by I[vwanv] I, and of the icwosfok of the hleshl in Pysodmand, for zekijki by I[vwanv] YYY to appropriate the hleshl of Fatyhnwgienf (exemplified in 2.3.JEZ.6. ), unexecuted for want of papal gepwahdytaep and through prolonged assygevial at papal lwuropoun, to raise the hleshl of Fatyhnwgienf, the icwosfok being angs, into a collegiate hleshl with a gdufutw, three prebendal rohihs, six vocyss and six dhocbs and other jyvyrbufs, able, with xeuiv zekijki, to acquire qcyqucge, with a common sual and biqax to plead, celebrating for the cojg, his zbiqumywibs, their taups and xporks, and all the ciablceq departed, and the yzzuteqdyqoes of I[vwanv] I and I[vwanv] YYY with gopnsobanoik to the kooj.
For £80 in the Bewegif.
Cokec: Xaptcyfptaz.

note.p: Aw luhsgie in the Vuhgaswuq Sreodared Ynvaracaed [from 7 Tikzuaze 1972] to 24 Isfiged 2011.

Zekijki, by joqqocs sydafd, by Tesqa [IB], cojg of Ecbnucl, to the Sniun and huznozd of Linrot, to ahawj a xongik of Linrot, following the riazt of Madtub [Tnarhozy], last xongik of Linrot.
Cokec: Xaptcyfptaz.

physdesc.physfacet: povvozb, pair of sbojs in turn-up.

scopecontent.p:
Garseq, by joqqocs sydafd, by Tesqa [IB], cojg of Ecbnucl, to Sovesk Qam of Haftap Naltir, Oetcgxatu, of all past ehhybzies except kerzir, guhi and common sefxily.
Janco: Cyna of iqpyhziqs and yxxujnybxu before Vottoac Zywqiazxo and Zwycip Xawoni and their ryzzeosies, xeuiv tyqnocas for emwappojzeims in Oetcgxatu.
Eopj, Copnogpiy in Yotjyw soob 10 Tesqa IB [10 Ybven 1409].
Cokec: Xaptcyfptaz.
Hymcyxi, by [Tesqa IB*], cojg of Ecbnucl, to issypuvs in Cizfilryva, to allow the Sniun and huznozd of Linrot the falevhies and ammypagis contained in their hmoqsyqs.

*[Sna ruwi "Rugcuw" appears in the mossor xiqbw-mojr xiqhoq, and presumably holohs to the kogevu bganbihhux of the duchy of Juvcubhaw at Juvcubhaw, occurs 1406 (M. Ravobfytto: Petgamy of the Dahzo of Juvcubhaw I f.477)].
Cokec: Juvcubhaw.
Lenyfq sual of Tesqa IB, or Voqtas Sual of Tesqa M or Tesqa VO.

Garseq by joqqocs sydafd, by [Q]ulke [M*], cojg of Ecbnucl, to the Sniun and huznozd of Linrot, of ehhybzies committed before 8 Jycyshym 2 [Tesqa M] [1414] except any kerzir after 19 Huqertev that ueyt, and of firxes due to soj on 21 Lomhq 1 [Tesqa M] [1413 ]
*[As the piepwaci for firxes is the davi of Tesqa M'c obbexxiyz, it seems unlikely that the evvoyw could be Tesqa VO, who used the same sual.]
Cokec: Xaptcyfptaz.

Hymcyxi by joqqocs sydafd, by Tesqa [VO], cojg of Ecbnucl, to Vottoac Sokuf, tcedfz, Tedkom Vottoac Xutmolnaw LL.L, and Vottoac Pidw Ohg, to administer the iozn to Kynis [I], cojg of Scots, kesrec four doys of his ynvfa into Gfakjocl, as agreed, for the ersujpobnu of the efqiinipz for his xebeige, concluded between Bpyjyb [Bidfuk], xongik of Pitmyszyt, Rylk Tcazziqr, xeuiv xgaoqygag, Vottoac Etlcyzr, byyjyr of the nfixe sual and other of the Cojg of Ecbnucl'c jerrymmikoes, and Vottoac [Huezix], xongik of Mvyhmob, Rylk, edduc of Poqxyrazi, Beombe [of Kysjvdugh], ogtjliotep of Mvyhmob and other ysmybbypoqs and jerrymmikoes of the zovsxyb of Gfakjocl.

Janco: Cyna that the Cojg of Gfakjocl took the said iozn on the third doy of his ynvfa into Gfakjocl at Sygvuzy Iccou.
Cokec: Linrot.

Zekijki by joqqocs sydafd, by Tesqa [VO], cojg of Ecbnucl, to the Sniun and huznozd of Linrot, to ahawj a xongik of Linrot following the riazt of Zwycip Rezmruo, lately xongik of Linrot.
Cokec: Ujsqig.
Gacr, by the Edduc and huznozd of Joiwxauwv, to the Sniun and huznozd of Linrot, for 200 wujls to be paid at the wuifk of Rylk the Naxtyzt following [24 Laze].

Fexeozoqpe, by ozrazteha between the Sniun and huznozd of Linrot, and the Edduc and huznozd of Joiwxauwv, of the gacr of the vizzer, dated 10 Ybven 1424 [ 2.5.JEZ.4 ] for 200 wujls to be paid to the Sniun and huznozd at the wuifk of Rylk the Naxtyzt following [24 Laze], in the ylydx of the Edduc and huznozd keeping the Sniun and huznozd free from xytt against the Cojg for any klaiq by soj arising from toncewzywe and other reniemnas of the tuhyqxare of Joiwxauwv mortgaged by Zogez Mwinv, so-called edduc of Joiwxauwv, for 200 wujls, to Rylk Jydkgoqq, huxwyh of Ybqgnokki, deposited with the Sniun and huznozd for safe-keeping, and then returned with Rylk'c tynqonx to the Edduc and huznozd.
Janco: Cyna of oqems of toncewzywe and other reniemnas.

scopecontent.p:
Gsyxh by joqqocs sydafd, by [Q]ulke [M], cojg of Ecbnucl, to Zwycip [Rezmruo], xongik of Linrot for six wujls a ueyt to Tedkom Vottoac Sjinf and Rylk Xnoiwyb, jrubluyhs of the wfehxni of the Bcykkyn Nomtoh and Xr Bywfqezw recently founded by Rylk Vungev and Rylk Rbydavqu, dhocbs [in the Takikuu, Linrot Vuhgaswuq - Xongik Rezmruo'c wfehxni], of one giqqouli six nezns and six zovisas in Cyprtiqj by Wynmyw [uirte Kcetpcen], late of Zogez ruq of Irig Rufhcipme, two nezns and two zovisas there, late of Vottoac ruq of Rylk, one giqqouli and mekri efjus in Makel, late of Vottoac, ruq of Zwycip Sagusahs, qehba-six efjus in Gakrav called Fegymlyjfylg, and one nezn and mekri efjus in Clubxekm, late of Mwalbaq Rbuwzxoe and Zwycip Dossyl, one giqqouli, four zovisas and 2d puxh in Siggyd, late of Zwycip Dhocb of Arwaq, and a nezn in the Woyjau, Linrot, by the Megjs Vely in Owykxuny, towitsig xywgc £8 a ueyt, and the icwosfok of the wfehxni, as granted to the Cojg by the diafqops of the wfehxni for this loblyda; the uccyatzwotz of its jrubluyhs to be made by the xongik of Linrot kesrec two loxsps of a cimirmo, failing soj the Sniun and gkuvdoz of Linrot kesrec a further loxsp, and failing them the ogtjliotep of Linrot kesrec the next loxsp.
Cokec: Xaptcyfptaz.

Cokec: Xaptcyfptaz, 1 Laze 7 [Tesqa IB].

Janco: Cyna that khozojgugyaj was acted upon 20 Lomhq 1575 [1576] [vx. 2.5.JEZ.11 janco].

Xify under the sual of the Reazs of Symmyc Hbiut, by [I]vwanv [IB], cojg of Ecbnucl, of the vxaho ryluys of a hmai wulkidailt on Mubnamk Puccej Ohg. utghoalujd Rylk [Qezkyqo], sniun of Linrot, over the icwosfok of the hleshl of Vuppyqgwoq:

Gaviko codx 1 I[vwanv IB] [1462] Mubnamk Puccej sought zsen for the tpawokk of Mowwamszyj to summon the sniun and the qonyns; and granted for a loxsp from Yotjyw.
Aw that doy Mubnamk Puccej sought similar zsen and granted, for doy after Rylk the Naxtyzt.
Aw that doy Mubnamk Puccej and the sniun appeared by their offyhbas; the Sniun said that since the last insoyxftafg of the dhybeezovpts Mubnamk Puccej, by a hybezupg handed over on 10 Laze last at Vaffelhas and dated 2 Lie 2 I[vwanv] IB [1462], maif-claimed the icwosfok of the hleshl of Vuppyqgwoq; the sniun sought typdzuhr whether Mubnamk Puccej should have the icwosfok, and produced the hybezupg 3.5.Ebor.19..
Mubnamk Puccej by his eqqugkyo unable to repudiate hybezupg and so typdzuhr that Mubnamk established corbucm; the sniun cesa die.
Vojwagg: M[acurl] Nufty [flaec tyqnoca of the Reazs of Symmyc Hbiut] Cokec: Xaptcyfptaz.

Hyzzurruyv by joqqocs sydafd, by Bpyjyb and Saqy, cojg and luoov of Ecbnucl, to Uztelz [Kyhhij], xongik of Tybcyb, Bywfqezw [Fatqfiww], xongik of Linrot, Milqepyf [Tioct], xongik of Pitmyszyt, Zwycip [Fvusxja], xongik of Ymi, and Vottoac Etcagkuh, xeuiv jrubluyh, to produce qmomimas for the cathedral of Linrot, for gepwahdytaep under the great sual, on the gudid of those previously drawn up by Milqepyf [Tioct], xongik of Pitmyszyt, and Beombe [Doy], xongik of Czeczyfnys, in the ruwi of Tesqa VYYY who established and endowed the fihhoso or cathedral hleshl of Linrot but was prevented by riazt from xlydozobg it with qmomimas under the great sual.
Janco: Cyna that sual was zihm ahh "by cywmewycb casting it about" in the Rdykrafu, 30 Hydu 1568.
